name: Far-Field Speech Recognition
description: Evaluates speech recognition accuracy at distances of 3-5 meters, typical for smart home and automotive scenarios.

metrics.name: wer_3m
metrics.definition: Word Error Rate at 3 meters distance

metrics.name: wer_5m
metrics.definition: Word Error Rate at 5 meters distance

test_method: Record speech at 3m and 5m distances using array microphones. Evaluate WER on clean and reverberant environments.
notes: Far-field ASR requires robust acoustic front-end processing including beamforming, dereverberation, and echo cancellation.
